definition: rushing about hastily in an undignified way, make unintelligible
details:
noun
- rushing about hastily in an undignified way
= synonyms: scamper
- an unceremonious and disorganized struggle
= synonyms: scuffle
verb
- make unintelligible
= example: make unintelligible
- stir vigorously
= synonyms: beat
- bring into random order
= synonyms: jumble, throw together
- to move hurriedly
= example: to move hurriedly
- climb awkwardly, as if by scrambling
= synonyms: clamber
